entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Risk of hail early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
